website_summaries.verdict: One of the top children's snow boots available for purchase, especially from this reputable company.
pros: Showcases the well-known Sorel brand name
Boot is designed as a pull-on
Warm, faux fur located inside of shoe
cons: A few customers wish the boots were shorter
Tend to run small in sizing

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a bit high...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have Sorel boots and I love them. So far these fit well. We haven't tried them yet in snow. The only thing I don't like is the rubber is like a platform shoe. It's like looking at a toddler wearing club shoes. My 16 month had some trepidation walking in them in the house but she eventually got use to it. I just hope they perform in the snow. Otherwise, they're going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki M&

customer_reviews.title: Not before the age of 2 years!!
customer_reviews.text: Big, heavy, clunky boots. These are NOT for pre/beginner walkers. Maybe for a 2 year old or older, but not before. I returned them and bought Enteer Infant Waterproof Snow Boots Premium Soft Sole Anti-Slip Warm Winter Prewalker Toddler Boots for $13.99!!!! Much better for my 11 month old that has just started walking.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Saladino

customer_reviews.title: Sorel sizes run small! Try in store first!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears size 6 toddler and i bought a size 7 in anticipation of how much sorel sizes down. Wring. Ahiulda bought an 8 because the size 7 was too tight. Im a fan of sorel for its quality, but i am still having a hard time gauging its sizing. Its like Nikes, where it runs pretty small. For example, my son is size 6 toddler but it looks like i need to buy size 8 for it to fit right. Im a 7.5 but i have to buy size 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for wider feet, and easy to take on/off!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for boots for my daughter and have had a hard time finding a pair that can accommodate slightly wider feet. I tried a pair of Kamik's first, but found they were too narrow so after some research, I decided to give these a try. I ordered a size up for my daughter and they fit really well. There is one velcro strap so it's easy enough that she can take them on and off. Overall, really great boots and am happy that I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: KJo

customer_reviews.title: These are toddler girls sizes
customer_reviews.text: These boots were too small for my son, which I thought was weird bc the last pair I purchased ran a little big. It turned out that the sticker on the box said toddler girls boots. They are all black, and they said toddler boy on the advertisement. I sent them back and ordered the bigger size. The bigger size fit perfect. Other than that, we love these boots and have bought them before! They are easy to get on and off. My two-year-old can put them on and take them off independently. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve ordered, just one size up. I bought these last year for my little and loved them and so does he. I was hoping we could skirt by this year with the same boots but kids grow. They are easy to put on and take off for him. They keep his feet warm, dry, and seem to be rather comfortable. I said this on my previous review, but these are a bit heavy/clunky and I do not recommend for beginner walkers. Other than that, these are great boots.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Just got these right now, I just pulled them out of the box, but the have stuff on them like small dog hair or something as if they were worn. The bottoms don't seem to have any damage to them nor the boots, but I just have a feeling I was sent a returned item from someone else. They are cute boots, they seem very sturdy, and true to size. I got a size 10 for my 3 year old boy, but I am still bummed out that I was sent something that looks used. I would return them, but I desperate need them and I dont want to wait anymore or go to kmart and get something cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vega

customer_reviews.title: Keep a toddlers feet warm
customer_reviews.text: The Sorel Commander has been a great boot for my toddler. They are easy to put on, fit as expected and have stood up well to continued use in snow and ice. They have also doubled as a snowboard boot for him and they have integrated well with the Burton Grom bindings. This is the second pair of Commander boots that we have purchased and we will continue to buy them each year as a result of our experience. These boots have my highest recommendation for any family looking for a solid product that is well made and provides warmth to battle the harshest of winters days.
customer_reviews.author: Hifi Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on, seem easier to walk in than expected, buy larger to make room for thick socks
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and they deserve 5 stars just for how easy they are to put on. They are lighter and easier for my son to walk in than I expected. They are lined heavily so they run slightly small. I bought one size larger and they fit perfectly over thick socks. If you have any doubt about sizing I would go slightly bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.author: ymmayer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for toddlers! Incredible quality as expected from Sorel. My child has pronation which is a condition where the foot doesn't stand evenly but inverts. These boots are perfect because they are so sturdy and well made. It seems they are easy to walk in and go about the snow without hinderance. They are extremely well made, a reliable product that would last years if a child's foot didn't grow so fast. They are completely waterproof and the tread is phenomenal. I highly recommend these boots for children.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Chic

customer_reviews.title: Boys love these boots
customer_reviews.text: It's October and it's not cold yet, but I got these in a size 6 for my 15 month old son who can already run and jump, but we were worried that they would be to heavy still. He won't take them off. My 3 yr old won't wear the ones we got him... Couldn't get the size right... Different brand... So I just bought a second pair of the red and blue ones in a size 8 for him. The description says that they are girls boots, but they look like boys shoes to us.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I know I love Sorel boots. I feel the difference in them verse my cheap Polars I wear as barn boots. So when it came to boots to keep my Kids feet warm during our extended periods of time outside I decided the extra investment was worth it. These boots are nice enough to be my 1.5YOs every day wear shoes. They are extremely easy to clean up, and are waterproof. Easy on and off. excellent quality Velcro strap closure.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ekkens

customer_reviews.title: Mom + toddler approved!
customer_reviews.text: I knew these would be great boots just based on the brand, but my toddler remains picky with everything, including footwear. He LOVES his boots! I purchased size 7 for his 5.5 little kid feet, so he can hopefully get two winters wear from them (fingers crossed), and they’re perfectly big, as expected. I’m so happy with the purchase - easy to put on, stay on, AND warm for these South Dakota winters!
customer_reviews.author: F.J.

customer_reviews.title: A bit big, and heavy, but no doubt they’ll keep him warm and dry.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are a Size 7 but are a bit bigger than his other shoes in this size. He’s 16 months old and the boots make it a little challenging to run in but he can walk just fine in them. He has a pair of Nike sneaker boots and these are about 2x as heavy as the Nike boots, so keep that in mind. I don’t see these as an every day boot he’ll wear but should be perfect for our snowy winter play days in Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Misleading temperature rating.
customer_reviews.text: I am super disappointed in this boot and this brand! I just received the boots yesterday. On the amazon item it says these boots are rated to -40 fahrenheit however I just noticed the box says -25 Fahrenheit. Where I live -40 is needed so I just wasted $49 on a pair of boots that my daughter will only be able to wear for one month. I am livid.
customer_reviews.author: Heather stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!  So easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots. So easy to put on and I could tell my son was comfortable. I hate the boots that make their feet look humongous, and these did not! I also hate when the boots are hard to put on, especially with younger kids, and these were so easy to get on. They have lasted well throughout the year. We live in a pretty cold area with massive snow this year and they kept his feet warm and protected from elements!
customer_reviews.author: Johnna W

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots for MN weather!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, warm pair of boots for your little one who has mastered walking (they might be too heavy for some). To test them we spent an hour outside when it was just barely 30*F. Her feet felt nice and warm to the touch when we returned to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very good winter boots for toddlers. I got these ones because they had the fit on top to keep out the snow, and also because they are very easy to take off and put on. Havn't had the chance to test them out in cold temps but last year my son had boots from Wal-Mart so I'm sure these will be much warmer than those.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D

customer_reviews.title: They are cute
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these, and they are fine for the most part, but they do not fit securely on my child's foot. I find myself having to put them on a couple times as one will often fall off and then the other... But they sure are cute and they keep her feet dry and warm. They work well enough for the amount we use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mama KF

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 Sorel Snow Commander Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for my daughter who is 3.5 years old. She is 40” tall and around 35-40lbs. These fit her with a little room to grow. This is the 3rd pair she owns. I love sorel boots for winter weather. She has been using them since she was a little over 1 years old. We have a size 7, 11, and 12 in these boots. She’ll definitely love the pink!
customer_reviews.author: M.sunshine.G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made but heavy and clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Way too clunky for our 15 month old (size 4 shoe) to walk in. She’s been walking since just over 12 months and these are just too cloppy and heavy. Plan to return. They seem very well made though! Just too heavy for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: cashmoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snow Boot for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these boots I've bought for my son. He outgrew his old ones, so we ordered another pair because they are so great. They are easy for small children to put on and are so warm. They are a bit "clompy" but that's to be expected with big snow boots. I always order two sizes bigger (and add socks) to extend the life of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sarah212

customer_reviews.title: Big fan, tested over 2 years with 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: Second year purchasing these, and actually my third pair because we got them this year for our 2 and 4 year old girls after a successful purchase last year. The style is easy to put on, fits as expected, and has tons of traction on the bottom of the shoes do the little ladies are not falling banging their knees and elbows (etc) as much. I’ve never noticed snow inside their boots either which is my personal nightmare. All in all, I will continue to buy this style for my kiddos in the coming years!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I will always go with Sorel for my kids boots from now on. They might be a little bit more expensive than some of the other boots you can get on Amazon, but with Sorel you know you are going to get something that keeps their feet dry and warm. Living in a marsh area in WI, it’s pretty important to have boots that keep out the water in the spring and stand up to the several feet of snow we can get in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what we wanted. We live in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan and we get lots of snow. These fit our 2yr old exactly how we wanted. We did size up a half size so she had room to grow and also so she could wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love. These. Boots.
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots. The other reviews are why I decided to purchase these over the others listed. We were traveling north from Texas and there was some unexpected snow. My daughter loved these boots. They’re warm and fuzzy, a dream to put on, Velcro stayed secure even when climbing & playing in hay and wood shavings. Would buy 100x over. And the overnight shipping was a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best snow boots for toddlers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought these for my toddler! She is almost 2 and I got her a size 7 (I sized up so she could wear thick socks with them). She walks great in the snow with these and they kept her feet warm all day! The best part is they are so easy to put on!!! We tried the Columbia snow boots last year and they were so hard to put on and super heavy. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cbugai

customer_reviews.title: 100% love these boots for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our almost 2 year old. They are one Velcro strap, so it was super easy to take on and off. They open up really big so we had no issues putting them on. They were snow proof, warm and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: AlishaShopsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm boots.
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for my 1 year old daughter for our hiking trip in Bryce Canyon National Park this past December. The temperature was around the mid 20s when we hiked (she was freeloading on my back) and these boots performed like a champ. Her little feet were warm and she even got to walk around in the snow and play.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off, great snow boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Large sole, which is great for the snow, but not ideal for walking inside. Warm interior, easy opening to get toddlers foot in and out. Look great, simple design, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shicadancer

customer_reviews.title: Warm Toes!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for toddlers. Easy on/off. Lightweight enough that they can run around. We had this boot one size smaller last winter and toes were always warm after being outside in the cold upper midwest winter. Great boot.
customer_reviews.author: cox

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for wide toddler feet. They open all the way down so you don’t have to fight the angle with a fatter foot. Seem very warm. The Velcro make it easy to close them tightly around pants. Great boot for a toddler overall. Hard to beat the quality of Sorel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We keep buying every year!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy they are to slip on for my daughter and close up. Have had three pairs and they keep her dry warm and don’t cause tears in the am trying to get everyone out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cole

customer_reviews.title: We will keep buying Sorel boots
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this pair of boots 2 consecutive years for our daughter. They are great! She loves them, they keep her feet warm, they are comfy, and great quality. She wears them even when it's not snowing. Sorel brand has never failed us though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Let it snow! Let it snow! Let it snow!
customer_reviews.text: My grandpeep loves them. He has a wide foot; these seem to fit him great. The wide front flap helps get his wide foot into the boot. Looked for awhile for something that would accommodate his feet. Glad I found these. Thank You Sorel!
customer_reviews.author: MissyMD

customer_reviews.title: easy to get this boot on the toddler!!
customer_reviews.text: Boot is warm, easy to get on the child and the strap stays in place, fit is excellent and such quality little sibling will be able to wear it also!! this brand is the best!
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide feet and we bought these and 2 other brands to try and these were the only ones that fit. And they fit with wool socks on. It hasn’t been snowy yet but we’ve used them for hiking and exploring and I think these are really great. Now the whole family has Sorels.
customer_reviews.author: slowmotionaccident87

customer_reviews.title: Kids Snow Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Size allows for long use. Can tighten and loosen as needed. Easy for kids to put on and adjust. Very effective snow boots. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: J. Covington

customer_reviews.title: Warm toes!
customer_reviews.text: Only winter boot I was able to find in a size 4. Fantastic boot for little feet! We live in Colorado and these have been great, toes are always warm when we come in from playing in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: P.E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Winter warmth
customer_reviews.text: These are nice boots I love the brand but these boots are a little bit too bulky for tiny feet I bought these for my granddaughter and all that are nice and that pretty they're a bit too bulky so I returned them on because of the of the heaviness
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA  JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Snow time!
customer_reviews.text: With a little room to grow. Can tuck in pants to boot comfortably (but who would want to), super cute, keeps snow and rain out, and warm little feet!
customer_reviews.author: tarynm

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Best snow boots you can get for your little ones. I don't have to worry about cold toes, because I have the women's Sorel winter boots and absolutely love them. Will be buying again when my little one out grows this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Devin O.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made but not flexible and a bit clunky
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy boots for the price. Only complaint is that they are a little heavy and not flexible so it looks like a bit of effort to walk in them.
customer_reviews.author: belledonne33

customer_reviews.title: They feel super soft and love the thick rubber soles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on deal for my daughter to wear this winter. We don't get a lot of snow but would rather have them on hand. Kid's feet grow so fast, I sized up to hopefully get 2 winters out of them. They feel super soft and love the thick rubber soles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve gone through 3 other pairs of these boots and love them more and more each time! Super easy to put on (my son is now 4 and has had a pair since he was 1), warm, waterproof, and comfy/easy to walk in. They’re perfect for Ohio snow mounds, slip resistant, and a great style!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy and warm they feel/look. The only thing is that they are just as heavy and stiff as a rock. My son walks like a robot lol
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia L.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's second pair of these boots. She was able to put them on and fasten them herself last winter (age 1 1/2) and can easily put them on and take them off a year later. They are warm and durable. They do not fall off so we don't have to worry about losing them.
customer_reviews.author: NorwegianwoodBlog

customer_reviews.title: Easy warm winter boot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for nearly two year olds to get into the snow and have fun without freezing! I would recommend tucking the top of the boot into the snow pant/bib and then secure the strap. - - Voila the snow will not pile up in the boots.
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE FLEURY

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality snow boots. Would highly recommend. True to size, kept feet warm abs has great traction in the snow and off.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Wet feet!
customer_reviews.text: If you want your kids feet to constantly be wet buy these boots! Not for real winters but might work for winters in Florida 😒
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Well made, attractive, and warm inside. My grandson never fusses when we put them on. Some boots are way narrow, and need muscle action to get them on. Not these, thankfully. Getting out of the house is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dhani Dare

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my best friend's little boy. They must be quality because they are his favorite shoes and he wears them every single day. They still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Banana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm and appear to be comfortable for my very active 5-year-old. As a parent, I am particularly grateful for the ease of putting these boots on and taking them off. It has been a true challenge finding shoes that are warm, water-resistant, and are easy to put on and wear. This is our jackpot!
customer_reviews.author: J. Small

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put on and tuck into snowsuit. I got them in a size five for my 17 month old girl. She is happy wearing them outside while I do about an hour’s worth of barn work. They keep her warm and comfortable. I will definitely buy the same ones next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: these boots are the cutest thing ever. Well worth the money. These boots will definitely keep your child's feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ratley

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they are so easy to put on. A great height, not too heavy and they keep the feet warm. Good tread too. There was enough room for larger socks. Through the years the whole family has worn Sorel's at one time or another and have been pleased with their quality.
customer_reviews.author: gadget guru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, sturdy and adorable. Perfect for my 3yr old. Easy to put on and take off. Really happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this style boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this style boots for kids! Easy to get on and off due to large Velcro opening. Each year we keep buying more in my daughters size as her foot grows. Had bought a different style same brand before and had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I always size up at least one size in winter boots for my kids. A thick sock plus their foot growing makes it work. These are good snow boots and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: momma3

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great quality and very insulated for cold weather, only downfall is they are really bulky and heavy. My 16month old son looked like he had bricks tied to his feet. I’m sure they would be great for older kids but do not recommend for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: K_g09

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a removable liner
customer_reviews.text: I haven't decided if I'm going to keep these yet. They are nice looking boots and fit well. However the description is wrong, they don't have a removable liner. The liner was one of the main reasons I ordered these boots for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Haggis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! My daughter loves them and They keep her feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Scaccia

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: The only boots I trust to keep my kids feet warm and dry. We hike in these in 15 degree weather and they’re feet stay toasty , play at the park, the backyard, and they’re so easy and comfortable they’re my sons choice every day.
customer_reviews.author: Spicymama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy these boots to put on and they are great for kids with wide feet. I just wish they were a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: Irishkarus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2 year old who is a size 5 a little big(bought a 6) to wear thick socks with & grow into the boots. His little wide, chubby fit comfortably! They do NOT disappoint! Snow, water & dirt proof!
customer_reviews.author: Leslye Medina

customer_reviews.title: Cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and fits as expected .. still looking for something to keep baby’s feet warm. When my son wears his snow suit with no boots (folded over on the feet) his feet stay warm... and when we put the boots on his feet were cold when we came inside. Still looking for that perfect boot to keep his little foot warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toddler Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter who will be 2 in Jan. This is a very nice quality boot. I thought maybe they would be too heavy for her feet when walking, but she walked just fine in them. I bought the size 6 for her.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA C.

customer_reviews.title: So Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have two little boys and every year we buy a pair of these Sorel’s, as they are wonderful winter boots. We live in Vermont so we need boots that are very durable, warm and are great in snow. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea LaClair

customer_reviews.title: Want to like and have other pairs but these were heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots for adjusting the fit and easy on and off, however, this one seemed very heavy and clunky (we ordered a size 10). I returned it for another brand boot that was much lighter weight and cold rated (Stonz).
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: warm and durable so far! Very impressed with the quality. I love sorels!
customer_reviews.author: lspike

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Snow Commander Snow Boot size little kid 4.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these. They arrived early and the packaging was great. Size was perfect. Love Amazon! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to put on and take off snow boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: These Sorel toddler snow boots are exactly what I was looking for for my daughter. They are easy to put on and take off and are super sturdy. I love that they come in half sizes too. Super cute and very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MamadoesitbestTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely adorable, all fur lined
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely adorable, all fur lined, perfect for those little feet that curl up with the velcro in the front. My two year old granddaughter liked them so much she walked around the house for hours in them.
customer_reviews.author: MJQ

customer_reviews.title: Easy, insulated, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were SUPER EASY to get on & off my toddler. They are insulated for -25F which is fantastic. I just found them too heavy for my tot to wear at the snow covered playground at school.
customer_reviews.author: Roger that!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, so easy to get on. Always a bit of a guessing game for size but seem to fit our 2 year well. Maybe he can wear them next year too...
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. My five-year-old son's feet stay warm and comfortable in freezing temps/snow/rain. They're a little bulky and heavy, but it doesn't seem to slow him down or bother him at all. Also have a pair for my two-year-old daughter and she does fine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit so much better than other snow boots we tried for my son. They're easy to put on and take off, and the inside is nice and comfy for him. They are slightly clunky, but something that makes them unusable. It just takes some practice walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: Benten24

customer_reviews.title: Winter
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, will work well with cold and snowy days in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: d12345

customer_reviews.title: Great winter buy!
customer_reviews.text: We’re noy used to snow so when we were planning to visit WV during the winter we had to prep. My daughter spent many days out in the snow playing and came in with warm (yet not sweaty) feet. They are heavy but she still had fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: L Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmth and Long Lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Warm, easy to put on, sturdy and long lasting! (Each pair has lasted through multiple kids)
customer_reviews.author: DhunterB

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: We started using Sorel boots when we lived in Winnipeg and have never looked back! These boots are extremely warm, even in the frigid prairie temperatures their little toes never get cold. These are the only boots we buy for fun out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: kev994

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this boot for my granddaughter - love this brand and very well made for cold snowy days!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boots for my five year old son
customer_reviews.text: Great snow boots for my five year old son. They are easy for him to put on a secure the strap. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: PattyN

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Took my son awhile to get good at walking in them. Soles are elevated.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand for my kids. They are durable and clean up nice.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Warm but heavy for little feet
customer_reviews.text: Son has to go outside multiple times a day for recess as long as temp is above 0 so wanted him to have really good boots to keep him warm. These are super cute and keep him warm, but he has complained about the heaviness on his little feet.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMOM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at the quality of the boots. Well made. Seemed to fit well. Hopefully will live up to the Sorel reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Antlers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and ease of putting them on.. they are warm and grandson loves them...they seem like they will hold up for his little brother also
customer_reviews.author: len

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I would give this boot 5 stars but going by what I had read I ordered a size up for my grandson and they are way to big. Stick to the child's true size and you should be good. We will save them for next winter though!
customer_reviews.author: Gamma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. I bought 2 pairs as I have 2 kids. These are comfortable, and kept their feet warm and dry. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cfgarq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. Super soft and warm. Great for our 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Look Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my soon to be 2 year old grandson. My son said they fit him well and they really like them. Being a baby he can't tell if they're warm as described or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tcsmith38

customer_reviews.title: Great snow shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sorel is an awesome company. These kept my daughters feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: CrazySis

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for upper pennisula weather! Holding up quite well
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Binger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are easy to get on and off, are lightweight and hug his ankles so he can't kick them off. Great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: We used these boots for our two year old for visiting the snow. He absolutely loved his new snow boots! The tread is pretty high, but our toddler got used to it almost right away, and really found them comfortable. Super easy to put in and fit snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby J. Rothman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm, easy to put on and good looking winter boots!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy for a toddler to walk in
customer_reviews.text: These boots are for my 15-month old grandson. My initial thought is they would be too clunky to walk, but he does just fine. He can walk and run with no issues. We haven’t had snow yet for him to actually test the warmth and traction.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Get These Boots! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Sorels! Great product for the kids and they will last!!
customer_reviews.author: Freethinker

customer_reviews.title: Great little snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Great little boots . Exactly as described and very well made
customer_reviews.author: TKL

product_meta.title: Sorel Snow Commander Snow Boot (Little Kid/Big Kid)
feature_bullets: READY FOR WINTER: A serious snow boot that's ready for snow, ice and everything in between; The go-to that keeps them cozy during snowball fights and sledding
COZY AND CHIC: A winter boot that's as cozy as it is chic; Made with synthetic textile and lined with fleece for a little extra comfort and warmth
ALL-DAY WARMTH: Features 200g of insulation to keep little toes warm as temperatures drop; 2.5 mm bonded felt frost plug in the midsole provides extra insulation
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Waterproof thermal rubber shell with multi-directional lug outsole provides extra grip for snowy and icy conditions
FUNCTION MEETS FASHION: SOREL creates bold, always-ready footwear that's built to take on non-stop days and nights in the city
